1.0.name: wordpress/improved-nav-menu
1.0.description:
Improved Nav Menu allows user to switch the link of a menu item. For example, if you want to redirect a page to her child, you don't need to create a redirect page template and use an additional loading for the the first page.

Plugin page : http://www.neoceane.com/plugins-wordpress/neoceane-improved-nav-menu/
